item.title: The move
item.description:
Hello world again!

So I forgot to extend my personal domain and decided to move to github for my personal blog.

My current todo list:

  • Move old posts (still not sure how)
  • Find better hugo theme

Update:

I won’t be moving anything, things can always be found on the wayback machine;

item.title: How to enable .net 2.0 on windows 10
item.description:
A few day ago I ran into a interesting issue. I needed .net 2.0 on Windows 10 machine.

Yeah, I know… welcome to the year 2016.

Lucky the issue is resolved easily. Search for “Turn Windows features on or off” or look it up in Control panel.

There you will find “.NET Framework 3.5 (includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0)”.

Just check it and click OK. The system will do the rest for you.

item.title: Noblesse oblige and about me
item.description:
With wealth, power and prestige come responsibilities.

The more you know more you have to share; That is the only way to more forward.

That’s my main drive; constantly learn and improve yourself and people around you.
